channel.title: Help with missing file?
channel.description: Ok, I found tutorials on how to enter custom Items on my rsps, I am using PI and as I was finding where to put everything I noticed 1. I am missing a ::pickup command, which I am working on now but if you could help please do, and what I really need help with is I have no class8.java file... and it is needed..

item.title: Help with missing file?
item.dc:creator: @tyyy9 tyyy9
item.description:
@tyyy9 wrote:

Get Blitz:

add that in commands.java server sided

I’m not that clueless for the record, its already their it just won’t work in game.

item.title: Help with missing file?
item.dc:creator: @tyyy9 tyyy9
item.description:
@tyyy9 wrote:

Thanks ill do that when I get there, can you please tell me how to get this code here to work?:

[code=java]if (playerCommand.startsWith(“pickup”)) {
try {
String[] args = playerCommand.split(" ");
if (args.length == 3) {
int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]);
int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]);
if ((newItemID <= 20000) && (newItemID >= 0)) {
c.getItems().addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
} else {
c.sendMessage(“No such item.”);
}
} else {
c.sendMessage(“Use as ::item 995 200 for example 200 gp”);
}
} catch(Exception e) {

                            }
                    }[/code]

It compiles just fine, but it won’t work,

Read full topic
